p: CHIKV strain (06.21) was isolated from a patient on La Réunion Island in 2005 [ 40]; viral stocks were produced after two passages on C6/36 cells. DENV-2 strain was isolated from a human serum collected in Bangkok (Thailand) in 1974 [ 41]; after 2 passages in Ae. albopictus, 2 others in Toxorhynchites amboinensis, and one in Ae. aegypti by intrathoracic inoculation, viral stocks were obtained by inoculating C6/36 cells. ZIKV strain (NC-2014-5132) was originally isolated from a patient in April 2014 in New Caledonia [ 42]; viral stocks were produced after 5 passages on Vero cells. All viral stocks were stored at -80°C until use.
